text: Young Cassidy is a 1965 British Irish biographical drama movie. It was directed by Jack Cardiff and John Ford. The movie is based on the life of playwright Seán O'Casey. Actors include Rod Taylor, Maggie Smith, Julie Christie, Michael Redgrave, Edith Evans, and Siân Phillips. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:1965 drama movies Category:1960s biographical movies Category:British biographical movies Category:1960s British drama movies Category:Irish biographical movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by John Ford Category:Movies directed by Jack Cardiff
title: Young Cassidy
